Municipal Register

The area for grid generation that can be input by the user is the PLZ Code (Postleitzahl). For the import of the building dataset the AGS (Amtlicher Gemeindeschlüssel) is needed (see Grid Generation). For the classification, the Regiostar class of that area needs to be provided (see Classification of Pylovo Grids).

The municipal register is created when setting up the database of the project by running main_constructor.py where the following function is called:

The data is read by the following functions:

Gemeindeverzeichnis

With the following functions the necessary population data is imported:

Regiostar
